English:
Another account grab case?
I don't mind, but let's make it someone
interesting this time.
Chinese:
又是帳號狩獵的委託喔？
是也沒差啦──這次的目標應該會好玩一點吧？
Korean:
또 계정 사냥 의뢰?
상관 없지만―― 다음에는 조금쯤 재미있는 녀석으로 해줘
German:
Wieder Kontendiebstahl? Soll mir ja recht sein,
aber nehmen wir dieses Mal jemand Interessanten.

English: That last guy was way too boring...
Chinese: 上次的目標真的很不起眼，又很無趣……
Korean: 얼마 전 그 녀석은 정말로 평범해서 따분했……
German: Der letzte Typ war viel zu langweilig ...

English:
That guy has started to look for the criminal who
stole his account.
Chinese: 那傢伙開始在找帳號狩獵的犯人了。
Korean: 그 녀석이 계정을 사냥한 범인을 찾기 시작했다
German:
Der Typ sucht jetzt nach dem Kriminellen, der
sein Konto gestohlen hat.

English:
It would be a problem for me if you were to get
arrested and talk...
Chinese: 要是你被抓住，多嘴說了什麼就麻煩了……
Korean: 네가 잡혀서 쓸데없는 소리를 하면 곤란하거든……
German:
Wenn du verhaftet wirst und den Mund aufmachst,
wäre das ein Problem für mich ...

English:
Don't worry.
I'll take good care of your account.
Chinese:
放心吧。
你的帳號，我會好好拿來利用。
German:
Keine Sorge.
Ich kümmere mich gut um dein Konto.

English: You're going to get to play the "bad guy" role.
German: Du darfst jetzt die Rolle des Bösewichts spielen.

English:
By defeating "Akira Hosaka"... I'll be able to be
a hero, just like him.
Chinese:
我和那傢伙並肩合作，打倒“保坂晶”，
這樣我們兩個……就能一起變成英雄。
Korean:
"호사카 아키라"를 쓰러뜨리고 나는 녀석의 옆에 선다.
우리들은…… 함께 히어로가 되는 거야
German:
Indem ich „Akira Hosaka“ besiege ...
Werde ich ein Held, genau wie er.

English:
And if that's not good enough, then "K" can be our
"enemy." Together "we" can take back what "K"
stole.
Chinese:
要是不順利，把“K”變成我們的“敵人”就好了。
“K”奪走的事物，“我們”會搶回來。
Korean:
그래도 안 된다면 "K"가 우리들의 "적"이 되면 돼.
"K"에게 빼앗긴 것을 "우리들"이 되찾는다
German:
Und wenn das noch nicht reicht, dann wird „K“
eben unser Feindbild. Dann holen wir uns gemeinsam
zurück, was „K“ gestohlen hat.

English:
Thanks to this powerful enemy, he'll depend on me.
He'll come to me...
Chinese:
只要四周都是強敵，那傢伙就會跑來依靠我，
來到我的身邊……
Korean:
강적과 대면하면 녀석은 나를 의지해줄 거야.
나에게 와 줄 거야…
German:
Angesichts dieses mächtigen Feindes wird er auf
mich angewiesen sein. Er wird zu mir kommen ...

English: That's what the "voice" told me to do...
Chinese: 那“聲音”是這樣和我說的……

English:
...He's the only one.
The only one who--
Chinese:
……就只有那傢伙，
只有那傢伙，我──
German:
... Er ist der Einzige.
Der Einzige, der ...
